meanings.def: a thin flat case used for carrying documents, drawings, etc.
examples: I left my portfolio on the train.

meanings.def: a collection of photographs, drawings, etc. that you use as an example of your work, especially when applying for a job
examples: She spent most of last year getting her portfolio together.

meanings.def: a set of shares owned by a particular person or organization
the particular area of responsibility of a government minister
examples: He was asked to join as a minister without portfolio (= one without responsibility for a particular government department).

meanings.def: the range of products or services offered by a particular company or organization
